meanings.definition: A person who paints or draws portraits.
meanings.sent1: The talented limner captured the likeness of the king in his portrait.
meanings.sent2: The limner carefully sketched the features of the young girl in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The limner painted a portrait of a potato with a crown, adding a touch of humor to his work.
meanings.sent4: Her brush danced on the canvas, like a limner painting a masterpiece of light and shadow.
meanings.sent5: The limner's portrait was so lifelike that it seemed to breathe with its own soul.

meanings.definition: To depict or describe in painting or words.
meanings.sent1: She will limner the beauty of the sunset in her watercolor painting.
meanings.sent2: The poet limners the emotions of love and loss in his verses.
meanings.sent3: He limnered a scene of chaos and order colliding in a swirl of colors on the canvas.
meanings.sent4: The author limnered the protagonist's journey as a path through darkness into light.
meanings.sent5: With each stroke of the brush, she limnered a world of dreams and fantasies on the canvas.
